sentences.en: A delicious smell of freshly baked bread wafted across the garden.
sentences.cn: 花园中飘过一股刚出炉面包的香味.

sentences.en: A freshly baked cake doesn't cut easily.
sentences.cn: 刚烤好的蛋糕不容易切.

sentences.en: Freshly baked apple pie makes a tasty dessert.
sentences.cn: 新烤的苹果派是很可口的饭后点心.

sentences.en: I love the delightful odour of freshly roasted coffee beans.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢新烘咖啡豆的清香气味.

sentences.en: She wore a freshly laundered and starched white shirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿一件刚刚浆洗熨烫过的白色衬衣。

sentences.en: Tallis leaned back, hands in the pockets of his freshly pressed suit.
sentences.cn: 塔利斯身子往后一靠, 双手插在他那刚烫过的西装口袋里.

sentences.en: That smell of freshly baked bread carries me back!
sentences.cn: 刚烤好面包的香气使我忆起往事!

sentences.en: The air, too, smelt more freshly than down beside the marsh.
sentences.cn: 这里的空气也比下面沼泽地旁清新多了.

sentences.en: the delectable smell of freshly baked bread
The fragrance of freshly brewed coffee wafted through the apartment.
sentences.cn: 刚煮好的咖啡的那种清香,在整个房间里飘荡.

sentences.en: The freshly painted stutters pleased the eye of the passenger.
sentences.cn: 刚油漆过的百叶窗,使过路人感到赏心悦目.

sentences.en: They're freshly baked. I fetched them from the baker's this morning.
sentences.cn: 它们是刚出炉的。我早上去面包房买回来的。

sentences.en: Twilight was sweet with the smell of lilac and freshly turned earth.
sentences.cn: 薄暮充满紫丁香和新翻耕的泥土的香味.

sentences.en: Two men were standing by the freshly dug grave.
sentences.cn: 两名男子站在新挖的坟墓边。

words.tran_cn: 新鲜的；清新的；淡水的；无经验的
新鲜人；大学一年级新生
显得新鲜；减少咸味；精神饱满
使清新；使新鲜；使精神焕发

trans.tran_cn: 新近，刚才，精神饱满地，气息清新地
trans.tran_en: If something is freshly made or done, it has been recently made or done
